metadata.title: CVE-2023-25516 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer, where an unprivileged user can cause an integer overflow, whichmay lead to information disclosure and denial of service.
